title: Please Rate the Teachers
content:
Math : kavyashree
Mechanics: shubha m
Chem: monima
C : Mohan Kumar
Epd : Nagaraj lj
How good is their teaching???

comments.body:
Shuba M- will solve all the needed problems in class but doesn't know anything beyond that

Mohan Kumar - pray to all the gods you know that he gets replaced otherwise you will have real problems. Start finding alternate study sources from day 1.

Monima- pretty good. Her notes are great and teaches well .
Don't know the others
bro kavyashree is good man , she was there for me in first sem , she was a assistant prof in nitk and frankly she taught very well
kavyashree the actual goat dude some dude had attendance shortage and was very likely to be ineligible for the esa but she came in clutch and bumped his attendance to 85
Kavyashree is the goat. She teaches really well and she's fun too.Â
where tf are u able to see your teachers??
mohan kumar is that bad ah? first sem also i had the worst python teacher...
You in EC ? In RR everyone got it updated
It will be updated in the time table section
